title: Using Angular with Visual Studio 2015

Visual Studio 2015 快速上手link

Using Angular with Visual Studio 2015link

有些開發者喜歡用 Visual Studio 作為他們的整合開發環境。

本文介紹了在Visual Studio 2015 的 ASP.NET 4.x 專案中使用 Angular 應用的各個檔案所需的步驟。

Some developers prefer Visual Studio as their Integrated Development Environment (IDE).

This cookbook describes the steps required to set up and use Angular app files in Visual Studio 2015 within an ASP.NET 4.x project.

本文中沒有現場演練，因為它介紹的是 Visual Studio，而不是《快速上手》應用程式本身。它使用 CLI 命令 ng new 建立的 Angular 入門應用作為例子。

There is no live example for this cookbook because it describes Visual Studio, not the Angular application itself. It uses the starter Angular application created by the CLI command ng new as an example.

ASP.NET 4.x 專案link

ASP.NET 4.x Projectlink

要用 Visual Studio 2015 在ASP.NET 4.x 專案中設定《快速上手》檔案，請遵循如下步驟：

To set up the Getting Started files with an ASP.NET 4.x project in Visual Studio 2015, follow these steps:

如果你希望使用ASP.NET Core並體驗全新專案， 參閱預覽版ASP.NET Core + Angular 的 Visual Studio 2015 範本。 注意，最終程式碼與本文不對應，請適當調節。

If you prefer a File | New Project experience and are using ASP.NET Core, then consider the experimental ASP.NET Core + Angular template for Visual Studio 2015. Note that the resulting code does not map to the docs. Adjust accordingly.

前提條件: Node.jslink

Prerequisite: Node.jslink

如果你的電腦裡沒有 Node.js®和 npm，請安裝它們。 參閱搭建本地開發環境以瞭解所支援的版本和安裝步驟。

Install Node.js® and npm if they are not already on your machine. See Local Environment Setup for supported versions and instructions.

前提條件: Visual Studio 2015 Update 3link

Prerequisite: Visual Studio 2015 Update 3link

使用 Visual Studio 開發 Angular 應用程式的最低要求是 Update 3。 早期版本沒有遵循使用 TypeScript 開發應用程式的最佳實踐。 要檢視你的 Visual Studio 2015 版本號，到 Help | About Visual Studio。

如果還沒有，安裝Visual Studio 2015 Update 3。或者使用 Tools | Extensions and Updates 來直接在 Visual Studio 2015 中更新到 Update 3。

The minimum requirement for developing Angular applications with Visual Studio is Update 3. Earlier versions do not follow the best practices for developing applications with TypeScript. To view your version of Visual Studio 2015, go to Help | About Visual Studio.

If you don't have it, install Visual Studio 2015 Update 3. Or use Tools | Extensions and Updates to update to Update 3 directly from Visual Studio 2015.

前提條件: 配置 External Web toolslink

Prerequisite: Configure External Web toolslink

配置 Visual Studio 來使用全域 External Web Tools，而非 Visual Studio 預設的工具：

Configure Visual Studio to use the global external web tools instead of the tools that ship with Visual Studio:

  • 到 Tools | Options 開啟 Options 對話方塊

    Open the Options dialog with Tools | Options.

  • 在左邊的樹中，選擇 Projects and Solutions | External Web Tools。

    In the tree on the left, select Projects and Solutions | External Web Tools.

  • 在右側，將 $(PATH) 移動到 $(DevEnvDir)上面。這樣，Visual Stuio 就會在使用自帶的外部工具時，優先使用全域路徑中的外部工具（比如 npm）。

    On the right, move the $(PATH) entry above the $(DevEnvDir) entries. This tells Visual Studio to use the external tools (such as npm) found in the global path before using its own version of the external tools.

  • 點選 OK 關閉對話方塊。

    Click OK to close the dialog.

  • 重啟 Visual Studio，以讓設定變化生效。

    Restart Visual Studio for this change to take effect.

Visual Studio 將優先在當前的工作區查詢外部工具，如果沒有找到，便查詢全域路徑，如果還沒有找到，Visual Studio 就使用自帶的工具版本。

Visual Studio now looks first for external tools in the current workspace and if it doesn't find them, it looks in the global path. If Visual Studio doesn't find them in either location, it will use its own versions of the tools.

前提條件: 安裝 TypeScript 2.2 for Visual Studio 2015link

Prerequisite: Install TypeScript for Visual Studio 2015link

Visual Studio Update 3 自帶 TypeScript 支援，但它的 TypeScript 版本不是開發 Angular 應用所需的最新版 TypeScript。

要安裝 TypeScript 最新版：

While Visual Studio Update 3 ships with TypeScript support out of the box, it currently doesn’t ship with more recent versions of TypeScript, which you need to develop Angular applications.

To install the latest version of TypeScript:

  • 下載並安裝最新版的 TypeScript for Visual Studio 2015

    Download and install the latest TypeScript for Visual Studio 2015,

  • 或透過 npm 安裝：npm install -g typescript@latest。

    OR install it with npm: npm install -g typescript@latest.

你可以在這裡檢視更多 Visual Studio 中 TypeScript 的支援。

至此，Visual Studio 已經準備好了。重新啟動 Visual Studio，這樣就可以有一個嶄新的開始了。

You can find out more about TypeScript support in Visual Studio here.

At this point, Visual Studio is ready. It’s a good idea to close Visual Studio and restart it to make sure everything is clean.

第一步：建立一個 Angular 的初學者應用 link

Step 1: Download the Angular Getting Started applink

Step 1: Create a starter Angular app link

遵循建立本地環境中的步驟，使用 CLI 命令 ng new 建立一個 Angular 的初學者應用。

Follow the instructions in Local Environment Setup to create a starter Angular app using the CLI command ng new.

第二步：建立 Visual Studio ASP.net 專案link

Step 2: Create the Visual Studio ASP.NET projectlink

按照下列步驟建立 ASP.NET 4.x 專案：

Create the ASP.NET 4.x project in the usual way as follows:

  • 在 Visual Studio 中，選擇 File | New | Project 選單。

    In Visual Studio, select File | New | Project from the menu.

  • 在範本樹中，選擇 Templates | Visual C#(或 Visual Basic) | Web 選單。

    In the template tree, select Templates | Visual C# (or Visual Basic) | Web.

  • 選擇 ASP.NET Web Application 範本，輸入專案名，點選“OK”按鈕。

    Select the ASP.NET Web Application template, give the project a name, and click OK.

  • 選擇自己喜歡的 ASP.NET 4.5.2 範本，點選 OK。

    Select the desired ASP.NET 4.5.2 template and click OK.

本文選擇了 Empty 範本，它沒有新增過任何目錄，沒有身份驗證，沒有伺服器託管。為你的專案選擇合適的範本和選項。

This cookbook uses the Empty template with no added folders, no authentication, and no hosting. Pick the template and options appropriate for your project.

第三步: 把這個 Angular 專案中的檔案複製到 ASP.NET 專案所在的目錄 link

Step 3: Copy the Angular project files into the ASP.NET project folder link

把 Angular 初學者應用中的檔案複製到包含 .csproj 檔案的目錄中。按照下面的步驟把它們加到 Visual Studio 中：

Copy files from the starter Angular app into the folder containing the .csproj file. Include the files in the Visual Studio project as follows:

  • 在 Solution Explorer 中點選 Show All Files 按鈕，顯示專案中所有隱藏檔案。

    Click the Show All Files button in Solution Explorer to reveal all of the hidden files in the project.

  • 右鍵點選每個目錄和檔案，選擇 Include in Project。 最少要新增下列檔案：

    Right-click on each folder/file to be included in the project and select Include in Project. Minimally, include the following folder/files:

    • src/app 目錄（如果詢問是否要搜尋 TypeScript 型別，回答 No）

      src/app folder (answer No if asked to search for TypeScript Typings)

    • src/styles.css

    • src/index.html

    • package.json

    • src/tsconfig.json

第四步: 恢復需要的包 link

Step 4: Restore the required packageslink

按下面的步驟恢復 Angular 應用程式需要的包：

Restore the packages required for an Angular application as follows:

  • 在 Solution Explorer 中右鍵點選 package.json，選擇 Restore Packages。
    這樣，Visual Studio 會使用 npm 來安裝在 package.json 中定義的所有包. 這可能需要花一點時間。

    Right-click on the package.json file in Solution Explorer and select Restore Packages.
    This uses npm to install all of the packages defined in the package.json file. It may take some time.

  • 如果願意，開啟 Output 視窗(View | Output)來監控 npm 命令的執行情況。

    If desired, open the Output window (View | Output) to watch the npm commands execute.

  • 忽略所有警告。

    Ignore the warnings.

  • 當恢復完成後，將會出現一條訊息：Installing packages complete。耐心點，這相當耗時間。

    When the restore is finished, a message in the bottom message bar of Visual Studio should say: Installing packages complete. Be patient. This could take a while.

  • 在 Solution Explorer 裡，點選 Refresh 圖示。

    Click the Refresh icon in Solution Explorer.

  • 不要將 node_modules 目錄新增到專案中，讓它隱藏。

    Do not include the node_modules folder in the project. Let it be a hidden project folder.

第五步：建構和執行應用link

Step 5: Build and run the applink

首先，確認 src/index.html 已被設定為開始頁面。 在 Solution Explorer 中，右鍵點選 index.html，選擇選項 Set As Start Page。

First, ensure that src/index.html is set as the start page. Right-click index.html in Solution Explorer and select option Set As Start Page.

按 F5 以在 VS 中執行link

To run in VS with F5link

大多數 Visual Studio 開發者喜歡按 F5 鍵來啟動 IIS 伺服器。 要在這個《快速上手》應用中使用 IIS 伺服器，你要做下列修改：

Most Visual Studio developers like to press the F5 key and see the IIS server come up. To use the IIS server with the Getting Started app, you must make the following three changes.

  1. 在 index.html 中，把基地址從 <base href="/"> 改為 <base href="/src/">。

    In index.html, change base href from <base href="/"> to <base href="/src/">.

  2. 同樣在 index.html 中，修改指令碼來用帶有斜槓的 /node_modules 代替不帶斜槓的 node_modules。

    Also in index.html, change the scripts to use /node_modules with a slash instead of node_modules without the slash.

  3. 在 src/systemjs.config.js 的頂部，把 npm 的 path 設定為帶斜槓的 /node_modules/。

    In src/systemjs.config.js, near the top of the file, change the npm path to /node_modules/ with a slash.

做完這些修改之後，npm start 不再工作了。你必須選擇配置為 IIS + F5，還是 npm start + lite-server。

After these changes, npm start no longer works. You must choose to configure either for F5 with IIS or for npm start with the lite-server.

為了使用路由的應用link

For apps that use routinglink

如果應用要使用路由，就要讓伺服器在使用者要求 HTML 頁面時始終返回 index.html。 此中原因，在釋出一章中有解釋。

當你在應用內部移動時，看起來一切正常。但是如果重新整理瀏覽器，或者在位址列中輸入一個到具體頁面的地址（也就是"深連結"）時，問題就來了。

你很可能從伺服器得到得到404 - 頁面不存在 —— 只有 / 或 /index.html 例外。

你就要配置伺服器，為那些"未知"的頁面返回 index.html。 lite-server 開發伺服器內建了這項功能。如果要切換到 F5 + IIS，你就要自己來配置 IIS 實現它了。 接下來看看對快速上手應用做配置的步驟。

If your app uses routing, you need to teach the server to always return index.html when the user asks for an HTML page for reasons explained in the Deployment guide.

Everything seems fine while you move about within the app. But you'll see the problem right away if you refresh the browser or paste a link to an app page (called a "deep link") into the browser address bar.

You'll most likely get a 404 - Page Not Found response from the server for any address other than / or /index.html.

You have to configure the server to return index.html for requests to these "unknown" pages. The lite-server development server does out-of-the-box. If you've switched over to F5 and IIS, you have to configure IIS to do it. This section walks through the steps to adapt the Getting Started application.

配置 IIS 重寫規則link

Configure IIS rewrite ruleslink

Visual Studio 自帶了一個 IIS Express，其中有一個重寫（rewrite）模組。 不過，如果使用標準版的 IIS，就要自己去安裝這個重寫模組了。

透過把下列重寫規則新增到 web.config 的底部，就可以告訴 Visual Studio 如何處理到應用頁面的請求。

Visual Studio ships with IIS Express, which has the rewrite module baked in. However, if you're using regular IIS you'll have to install the rewrite module.

Tell Visual Studio how to handle requests for route app pages by adding these rewrite rules near the bottom of the web.config:

<system.webServer> <rewrite> <rules> <rule name="Angular Routes" stopProcessing="true"> <match url=".*" /> <conditions logicalGrouping="MatchAll"> <add input="{REQUEST_FILENAME}" matchType="IsFile" negate="true" /> <add input="{REQUEST_FILENAME}" matchType="IsDirectory" negate="true" /> </conditions> <action type="Rewrite" url="/src/" /> </rule> </rules> </rewrite> </system.webServer>

匹配 url <match url=".*" /> 陳述式將會重寫每一個請求。如果需要直接放行某些請求，比如一些 Web API 請求，你就必須調整它才行。

<action type="Rewrite" url="/src/"/> 中的 url 將會匹配 index.html 中的基地址（base href）。

The match url, <match url=".*" />, will rewrite every request. You'll have to adjust this if you want some requests to get through, such as web API requests.

The URL in <action type="Rewrite" url="/src/"/> should match the base href in index.html.

點選 Run 按鈕或者按 F5 鍵，用偵錯程式建構和啟動應用。

Build and launch the app with debugger by clicking the Run button or by pressing F5.

按 Ctrl-F5 不帶偵錯程式的執行應用，速度會更快。

It's faster to run without the debugger by pressing Ctrl-F5.

預設瀏覽器開啟並顯示《快速上手》例子應用。

嘗試編輯任何專案檔案，儲存並重新整理瀏覽器來檢視效果。

The default browser opens and displays the Getting Started sample application.

Try editing any of the project files. Save and refresh the browser to see the changes.
